name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: Always-on Retina display, ECG app, Blood Oxygen app, and water resistance up to 50 meters.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
description: Advanced sleep coaching, body composition analysis, and enhanced GPS tracking.

name: Fitbit Sense 2
description: Advanced health metrics, stress management tools, and built-in GPS.

name: Garmin Forerunner 955
description: Advanced training features, multi-band GPS, and up to 15 days of battery life.

name: Amazfit GTR 4
description: 150+ sports modes, 14-day battery life, and built-in Alexa assistant.

name: Fossil Gen 6
description: Wear OS by Google, SpO2 monitoring, and fast charging capabilities.

name: Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro
description: Titanium case, sapphire glass, and comprehensive health monitoring.

name: OnePlus Watch 2
description: Dual-chip architecture, 100+ workout modes, and up to 100 hours of battery life.
